post.body:
Hello ZeroMe!
I'm here too ;)

I will start sharing my vEmoBlog here in the Me site:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/14sYamG8agjTLeW8DfwTKbYRmTwaPbs4au

It is a place where I share my YouTube videos in which you can share an emotion with me :)

Secondly.. my 8baway Blog [8 bits away]:

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN

I write things during breaks in my workaholic life... I called 8 bits away because of the ZeroNet inspiration, It has started here :)
seems like here, not so many people are sleeping during these days :')
Zero Me... or more than zero ? ; )

Italian or English ?
Now I'm valuating the Italian language again.. even if............﻿

http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN/?Post:14:Italian+or+English+

hmmm..
what about a sort of a ZeroNet KickStarter program?
Obviously, It won't be something about payments but about valuable projects to seed :)

China, Japan and north america are actually the most connected areas to ZeroMe at 1:22 PM UTC :)
 but no Russia, no canada, no africa, no mid-oriental, oceanic or polar areas! '0'

I ended up with a pool about the mainstream language to use in my feeds (italiano vs. english) and It ended Up with a 50:50 #LMAO XD

[english vs italiano: blog post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN/?Post:14:Italian+or+English+)

I think that there should be a service like #RSS to keep an eye to what is going on #zites/blogs we are following.. I don't know, via proxy!.. only text informations accessible by clearnet!
Don't You think? :)

There should be a sort of #VPT / #Tamagotchi for ZeroNet!
A ZeroTamago* or 0Tamago!! :D
with battles too ^_^

*Tamago means egg in japanese

Oggi nasce [0Nita](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BrdUYNAbRt4P2Jxpgk5WhtKR2oLicBgcw) un progetto che si propone di avvicinare i pochi siti italiani presenti qui sulla ZeroNet!
progetto disponibile anche su [GitHub](https://github.com/FraYoshi/0Nita)

My entire life is nearly a drastic change..
A new era is coming for me, I have just passed my 1/4 of century.. Time for the 2nd one.
[blog link](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN/?Post:15:The+Dawn+of+the+2nd/4.)

added music to my last blog post.. added It as an optional file, can you listen at It?
the download could take a while because of my slow italian internet link but in some minutes it SHOULD start :)

[music post link](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN/?Post:15:The+Dawn+of+the+2nd/4.)

pssss thanks to [Ilcont3j](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Me.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Profile/1GrEenUGRWnzaNZjR3XsQa6dQgdPDTyt7i/1NS9qMabhcMJpQqeqeFy14j3z9DkqNCWzS/) for helping me in this (:
one more time at my loved work ^_^

[Back to the VSE](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN/?Post:17:Back+2+the+VSE) Blog post

And here I come back.. With a new blog post about my workaholic life ^^

I'm between the most active people on ZeroMe xD
I talk about It on [my last blog post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN/?Post:17:Back+2+the+VSE) too ^_^

activated the IPFS plug-in 4 firefox :3

It actually works perfectly ^_^
any "apt28" here? ;)
In Italy are talking about the govern to control news posted in internet. Hip Hip Hurrah for ZeroNet! B)

Any way to integrate IPFS with ZeroMe? :D

HAPPY NEW YEAR ZeroMmers!! ;D

what about news zites?
I actually know about [these 4](http://localhost:43110/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Topic:13_1By85xCDz7VyZEq9WjmhtbNaPKimQwhPLp/News+zites+anyone)

any other?
and what about some sort of creative commons feed of news by various journals? :)

http://www.agi.it/international/2017/01/10/news/the_cyber_espionage_in_italy_and_two_more_news-1360285

uhm.. any way to post images on ZeroMe from IPFS insted of Hub's folder? :) #_testing zone:_ --- ![IPFS_test](http://127.0.0.1:8080/ipfs/QmVcNLuyoQMYM7spfjXNe1VZUrHVojCnN4Wb5vNc3RHKQs/16443476_10154019879811467_728096122_n.jpg) --- ![IPFS_test](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmVcNLuyoQMYM7spfjXNe1VZUrHVojCnN4Wb5vNc3RHKQs/16443476_10154019879811467_728096122_n.jpg) https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/Qmbke9gr9JtrR9eJ3Ff83byMLeci2GyecRgQYahPr8mm1c/Apollo%2011%20Intro.mov ---

_service restored after IP change (dynamic, router rebooting)_

and [This](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GrwWFTmrKgUGQsGxrKSsRbb2dt8UJaBPN/?Post:9:Back+offline!) happened after searching things about the DarkNet, anonymity and stuff like this....

I am worried about the ZeroNet security.. I mean... Could happen something like bitcoins? Banks are destroying It making bank shares of It....
An entity that want to destroy the network could create an infinite number or webites until saturation.... ZeroNet is based on bitcoins' blockchain if I am not wrong.... so It could happen!

"Potentially unsafe part of the pattern: /* in media/music/*"

when trying to sign a blog of mine... anybody have ideas?

IPFS or ZeroNet in a single blog post for a singular image?

i.e. In my blog I post images with IPFS and if people have not the client opened.. an alt message apper:

`![ipfs_VSE_screenshot](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmR2HZ6xX1YrnG5cLN8ehMA24ptyyhhrqJQX9i7RP8aCP6)`

but I'd like to do s.thing like showing an image instead of an alt message (the same but on the zite folder).. is It possible someway?

¿something like this?


`![![local image](media/img/VSE_screenshot.jpeg)](https://gateway.ipfs.io/ipfs/QmR2HZ6xX1YrnG5cLN8ehMA24ptyyhhrqJQX9i7RP8aCP6)`

my zeronet's sites.json has been renamed to sites.json-tmpold-numbers ... that confused me for a couple of minutes.. because the new sites.json was not working.. everything came back to when the file is created (no zites).. I just deleted the new sites.json and renamed the tmpold one...

anyboudy else experienced this issue? I see that there are a lot lesser peers on the main zites.. could It be because this happened to more than once and they don't know how to fix it?

Their answer:

*"Hello,
Thanks for writing in and bringing this to our attention. It appears your account got caught by Reddit's spam filter. We have reviewed your account and lifted the restriction(s) on it.
-Your Reddit Trust & Safety Team"*

lzo compression in a btrfs for zeronet, 19 GB in total but with compression, 17G =)

Just found out that running a defrag on btrfs is a killing reflink feature, so is to well consider when and if is to do.
[Mail link](https://www.spinics.net/lists/linux-btrfs/msg69099.html)

This apparently solved the duplicates problem in btrfs after defrag for me :)

If you have a better script, I'm happy to consider it !!

`find . -type d \( -name .git -o -name .snapshots \) -prune -o -type f -print | rmlint -T df -p --config=sh:handler=clone -`

!! WARNING !!

also docker directory should be added to the excluded list, actually I cannot longer start my ones...... Docker works git style AFAIK and this could be the break reason....

this should do the trick:
`find . -type d \( -name .git -o -name .snapshots -o -name docker \) -prune -o -type f -print | rmlint -T df -p --config=sh:handler=clone -`

by the way, other things could be damaged even if actually I have not found them out... I suggest running this only on target directories where no damage can be done, not on the root !

diffusion of the #CoronaVirus in Asia .

at 2020.1.24 17:25:
887 confirmed contagious
1000 and more suspected
26 deaths

人 = people
---
A rough translation of what the person that shared this report have to say:

"A little thought

In the great fog and the first block of Jinan, Wuhan pneumonia had nothing to do with me. It was only yesterday that a colleague told me that she had been to Wuhan recently, and suddenly my heart became heavy. Because my hometown is Weifang, the original plan was to return to my hometown tomorrow. This time I was very embarrassed and didn't know how to deal with it.

Finally decided to return home. Departing on the 24th, 2 hours later, at the intersection of the expressway, they were tested and examined, and their body temperature passed normally.

The primary cause of this outbreak is the Wuhan government. When the outbreak occurred, the government not only failed to tell the public in time, but instead dealt with those who spread the news online. If it wasn't for Academician Zhong Nanshan's public meeting in Wuhan that medical personnel had been infected, it would not be known how long this serious epidemic would be concealed.

The Wuhan government is a bad government, and it has been reflected in the handling of p2p incidents. When proactively resolving such crises across the country, the Wuhan government decided to use procrastination. What's more interesting is that Yunnan solved the case for Wuhan and named Wuhan's efforts in the past few years. Internet financing such as Yirong Hengxin and Compound Investment are illegal and illegal. When the Yunnan case was filed for investigation, the Wuhan government and the public security department faced it negatively. Today, the above two platforms are in a state of non-payment.

Either God's providence or man-made disaster. The development of the epidemic to this day is closely related to the consistent inaction of the Wuhan government.

Starting at 10 am on January 23, Wuhan began to close the city. The Wuhan government did not choose to report the truth truthfully at the beginning of the epidemic. It's amazing how big a city can be."

source: [/15b76H3Atqkne8WXdSzfJdeKGhX7FdktHi/?Post:7:武汉新型肺炎跟踪更新](/15b76H3Atqkne8WXdSzfJdeKGhX7FdktHi/?Post:7:武汉新型肺炎跟踪更新)

Hellow!!

Recently I discovered about twitch and I must admit, I always snobbed it, I thought It was something just for gamers and since I am not that much interested in games I discarded it... It was until recently, when I found out that there's a lot more going on there that I re-evaluated it as a platform, this is why I started streaming over there as a test a couple of times and decided to switch to it for my live streamings for the time being.

I would really appreciate anybody that follow me back there, I need to reach 50 followers to enter the affiliate program :) until then I will anyway continue to stream on YouTube as a backup for a while but at some point I will just upload replays or video, probably some timelapses for the observation streams and replays for the others.

I won't leave youtube, just switching to twitch for the live streams.

Hope to see you there!!

My idea is a p2p site where people can decide to seed that specific website because revolutionary.. or maybe could offert Its help to improve it!
Something like [ZeroProxies](http://127.0.0.1:43110/ZeroProxies.bit), [Play](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1PLAYgDQboKojowD3kwdb3CtWmWaokXvfp/), [PedoBlocker Wiki](http://127.0.0.1:43110/15dfgcBhYM8Nkn7miAoetavifmJryUfCqv/), [ZeroLeakZ](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1DaXkbpBN7d9h78T5mjB2gTV9Ui46Bjwcv/), [Games Nintendo](http://127.0.0.1:43110/19za8TViGJF4xdvkQHLXK2UCb2gLC1nSVT/)...

My idea is a "kickstarting like" website where these sites can be enhanced in order to increase the numbers of seeder :)

Maybe with a reddit like system that ups the most charismatic projects :)
It's a sort of p2p twitter.. the higher is the traffic the faster it becomes :)

I continue not to trust services that centralize these kinda info :)
An hacking attack to their servers could result in a spread of passwords, even if crypted...
People should begin memorizing passwords easy to remember but not to hack in my personal opinion ^^

Hi @leftside !
.git because [discouraged from the docs](https://rmlint.readthedocs.io/en/latest/rmlint.1.html) and .snapshots because it saturates my ram for some reason ^^"

_"Also traverse hidden directories? This is often not a good idea, since directories like .git/ would be investigated, possibly leading to the deletion of internal git files which in turn break a repository. With --partial-hidden hidden files and folders are only considered if they’re inside duplicate directories (see --merge-directories) and will be deleted as part of it."_
even if I'm working with reflinks instead of deletations, so mainly it wouldn't be that much of a problem, just I'm not sure..... I don't want to destroy my local .git repositories =)
data that thanks to the way the FS works, is just metadata but if it wouldn't (mainly snapshots) it would be that much big  @leftside : )

oh... sorry @leftside ... 
put very simply, it's like building an house (file) every time you need to say where you live or just build it once and then tell only the address (metadata) =)

actually i'm in red @Deliriumgoddess6 ...

it's ~ € 0.25 for the first 375 KWh every month, then it grows to ~ € 0.45 (VAT included) @Ulrichard ... yes, I'm above the average because outside cities there's need for certain stuff like water pump for the water, drainage system, limestone treatment system and I could go on.. then we suffer an electricity dispersion and this grows the consumes... This means that we need, overall, more power and it is rated higher. Actually, also happens that people on standard rate don't pay the bill and this translates in the organization that provides power to ask these lost money to the people on the higher price tier... like me, @leftside . (it's considered luxury even if for me is just disservice and taking profit on).

I loose light bulbs once at month and lost also different electronics because of this bad electricity quality.

commercial prices are even higher.. my family has a small bar and the rate is a little bit more complicated but I can tell you that we pay over €700 per month.

yes @leftside , you got it... electricity is privatized as many other things u.u
the reason of the high electricity cost I think is also because we are one of the countries where petrol is [at its highers](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gasoline_and_diesel_usage_and_pricing) and we have not nuclear reactors... actually, we buy energy and gas from other countries (gas from Russia AFAIK :)

I'm capable of enjoying any kind of music but I'm more addicted to some @leftside .. 
It also really depends on what I'm doing ^^
In my favorites there are japanese folk, pop (prefer j version), gothic metal, classical, cyber punk and these are the firsts that pop out on my mind : )
